front.title: •Great Shot, Kid!
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If Death Star 'blown away': Whenever you deploy a unique (*) starship to a system location, retrieve 3 Force; Once per during each of your turns you may deploy (for free) a starship from hand or Reserve Deck and reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: With the destruction of the Death Star, the Rebel Alliance received new-found support throughout the galaxy.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Great Shot, Kid! + Launching The Assault Make the most out of the free deploy by adding to your drains with all those Star Cruisers you can have.

Great Shot, Kid! + Home One + Admiral Ackbar + First Officer Thaneespi First use Great Shot, Kid! to get Home One, deploy it free, deploy Ackbar on it for two (You can use Balanced Attack to grab Ackbar), use Ackbar to get First Officer Thaneespi and deploy her for one. Suddenly, for only three Force you have a power 15 capital ship with immunity to attrition of anything less that ten and forces your opponent to come up with seven or more ability before any attrition can happen!
